body.raw:
# Accordion

## Import

```jsx live=false
import {
  Accordion,
  AccordionItem,
  AccordionButton,
  AccordionPanel,
  AccordionIcon,
} from '@totejs/uikit';
```

## Usage

```jsx
<Accordion>
  <AccordionItem>
    <AccordionButton>
      Section 1 title
      <AccordionIcon />
    </AccordionButton>
    <AccordionPanel>
      Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut
      labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco
      laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
    </AccordionPanel>
  </AccordionItem>

  <AccordionItem>
    <AccordionButton>
      <Box>Section 2 title</Box>
      <AccordionIcon />
    </AccordionButton>

    <AccordionPanel>
      Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut
      labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco
      laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
    </AccordionPanel>
  </AccordionItem>
</Accordion>
```

## Status

### isDisabled

```jsx
<Accordion defaultIndex={1}>
  <AccordionItem isDisabled>
    <AccordionButton>
      Section 1 title
      <AccordionIcon />
    </AccordionButton>
    <AccordionPanel>
      Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut
      labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco
      laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
    </AccordionPanel>
  </AccordionItem>

  <AccordionItem>
    <AccordionButton>
      <Box>Section 2 title</Box>
      <AccordionIcon />
    </AccordionButton>

    <AccordionPanel>
      Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut
      labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco
      laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
    </AccordionPanel>
  </AccordionItem>
</Accordion>
```

## Props

### Accordion Props

<PropsTable
  data={[
    {
      name: 'allowMultiple',
      required: false,
      type: 'boolean',
      default: true,
      desc: 'If true, multiple accordion items can be expanded',
    },
    {
      name: 'index',
      required: false,
      type: 'number',
      default: '',
      desc: 'The index(es) of the expanded accordion item',
    },
    {
      name: 'defaultIndex',
      required: false,
      type: 'number',
      default: '',
      desc: 'The initial index(es) of the expanded accordion item',
    },
    {
      name: 'onChange',
      required: false,
      type: '((expandedIndex: ExpandedIndex) => void)',
      default: '',
      desc: 'The callback invoked when accordion items are expanded or collapsed.',
    },
  ]}
/>

### AccordionItem Props

<PropsTable
  data={[
    {
      name: 'isDisabled',
      required: false,
      type: 'boolean',
      default: false,
    },
  ]}
/>
